description: A solar sail spacecraft could extend space weather warnings from 40 to 60 minutes, offering vital lead time before solar storms strike. Part of the SWIFT mission, this satellite will orbit farther than any current monitor, using sunlight for propulsion. The system aims to better protect satellites, astronauts, and power grids from geomagnetic disruptions caused by solar eruptions.
title: Solar Sail Spacecraft Could Boost Space Weather Warnings by Nearly 60 Minutes

description: Blue Origin’s 14th crewed spaceflight, NS-34, lifted off from West Texas on August 3, 2025. This symbolic flight marked the long-postponed space journey of Justin Sun, crypto billionaire and founder of Tron. Joined by adventurers and professionals from different corners of the world, including India and Puerto Rico, the mission highlighted global participation in private space travel.
title: Blue Origin’s NS-34 Mission Successfully Carries Global Crew

description: Court Kacheri is an upcoming legal drama series starring Ashish Verma and Pawan Malhotra in the lead roles. The series will revolve around Param Mathur, son of a renowned lawyer, who is forced to follow his father’s legacy, despite his will. Watch from August 13th, 2025, only on Sony LIV.
title: Court Kacheri OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Hebbuli Cut is a story of childhood dreams, social injustice and the quiet courage to keep going. Bheemrao, in this tale, has shown how much the country has developed; however, certain villages still live by caste and creed discrimination. He narrates the story so well without any emotional melodrama, but in a fun and thought-provoking manner. Just a simple haircut leads to showing caste discrimination.
title: Hebbuli Cut OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Hosted by Harsh Gujral, India’s Biggest Foodie, has finally landed on JioHotstar. This show follows 100 participants facing the bizarre and unique food challenges to earn the title of India's Biggest Foodie. The show also introduces the country with regional delicacies. Watch now.
title: India’s Biggest Foodie Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know About This Food Challenge Show

description: Narivetta, a gripping storyline, stellar performance, striking visuals and great direction. It highlights the struggle of the Adivasi community, who the in-power political parties brutally torture. As they revolt for their land, the community is brutally tortured, but they don't give up. It's something worth watching and streaming now on Sony LIV.
title: Narivetta Now Streaming on Sony LIV: Everything You Need to Know

description: New research based on New Horizons’ decade-old data has uncovered extensive bladed terrain made of methane ice on Pluto. These towering spires, arranged in spaced-out, parallel rows, are likely shaped by seasonal condensation and sublimation cycles. While the terrain spans over half the planet’s midsection, five times the width of continental USA, scientists remain unsure of its uniformity.
title: NASA Data Shows Pluto’s Equator Is Lined with Towering Methane Ice Spires

description: 2K Games is reportedly unhappy with the development of the next BioShock game has changed the leadership at developer Cloud Chamber after an internal review. The studio head has departed, and the game's creative director has reportedly been moved to a publishing role.
title: Next BioShock Game Set for 'Overhaul' After 2K Shakes Up Studio Leadership: Report

description: Honor Magic V Flip 2 will feature a 5,500mAh battery with 80W fast charging, according to a tipster. It could be the largest battery to debut in a clamshell foldable to date. In comparison, the existing Magic V Flip has a 4,800mAh battery with 66W charging. The new model is expected to run on a sub-flagship Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, with a 6.8-inch full-HD+ LTPO main screen, 4-inch cover display, and a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup.
title: Honor Magic V Flip 2 Battery, Charging Details Leaked by Tipster; Said to Feature Segment's Largest Battery

description: Poco is gearing up to launch a new smartphone in India. The company teased the arrival of the new handset through its India website and Flipkart without revealing the moniker. The upcoming device is speculated to be the Poco M7 Plus. A leak reveals the launch date, price range and possible specifications of the phone.
title: Poco Teases Arrival of New Smartphone; Poco M7 Plus India Launch Date, Price Range Tipped

description: Samsung Galaxy A17 is likely to launch soon. Alleged renders and marketing materials have now revealed key details about the upcoming Galaxy A-series phone. The images show the handset in black, blue, and grey shades with a vertically aligned triple rear camera setup. The Galaxy A17 is said to use the same  Exynos 1330 chip as the Galaxy A16 used last year. It was earlier tipped to offer the Exynos 1380 chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 Design Renders Leaked Alongside Specifications; Might Not Feature Upgraded Processor

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE's possible colour options were recently revealed by a tipster. Now, the renders of the rumoured ‘Fan Edition’ handset have appeared online, suggesting the design and colourways of the handset. The new leak aligns with the previous tip, which also suggested similar colour options. The phone is said to come in two storage variants as well.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Design, Colourways Leaked Online

description: Airtel’s fully-owned subsidiary Xtelify launched a telco-grade cloud platform for telecom businesses on Monday. Dubbed Airtel Cloud, the cloud platform was initially designed to serve the telecom operator’s internal operational requirements and houses all its digital assets and capabilities. It is said to handle 140 crore transactions per minute. Airtel is now expanding the platform to third-party telecom service providers as an Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) and Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) model.
title: Airtel Cloud Launched by Xtelify as Gen AI-Ready Cloud Platform for Telecom Businesses

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 is now live for Prime subscribers, offering price cuts on various electronics. Apart from direct price cuts, the e-commerce platform is also giving additional bank offers, easy EMI options, and exchange deals to its Prime members.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Redmi 13 Prime, Redmi A4, Redmi Note 14 and More Redmi Phones

description: Boult has rebranded to Goboult, aiming to become a global Indian tech brand focused on Gen Z customers. In FY2025, it earned Rs. 800 crore and targets Rs. 1,000 crore in FY2026 and Rs. 2,000 crore by 2030. Goboult plans international expansion and will grow its retail presence from 3,000 to 30,000 stores in 18 months. Entering the Rs. 2,000+ segment, it will offer premium wearables and invest Rs. 25 crore in R&D, focusing on AI, design, and pop culture collaborations like Mustang.
title: Boult Adopts New GoBoult Branding in India; Unveils New Logo

description: The Meta-owned photos and video sharing platform, going forward, will not allow its users to go live on Instagram if they do not have a public account with at least 1,000 followers. The tech giant silently disabled the feature by only updating the support page on its website.
title: Instagram Not Allowing Users To Go Live If They Don’t Have 1,000 Followers

description: Samsung Galaxy A56 and Galaxy A36 are the latest A series phones from the South Korean giant. The Galaxy A56 offers an improved premium design and minor hardware upgrades. The Galaxy A36 also offers minor upgrades across the board. Both phones come with AI features and long software support. Are these enough to recommend them over their competition? Read our review to find out.
title: Samsung Galaxy A56 and Galaxy A36 Review: Polished Looks, Modest Upgrades

description: Samsung has announced its ‘Big Celebration, Bigger Screen’ campaign in India. The Independence Day-themed special campaign brings discounts and deals on Samsung’s Vision AI Big TVs. It is currently live in India from August 1 and will conclude on August 31. The sale brings offers on select 55-inch and above models.
title: Samsung's 'Big Celebration, Bigger Screen Sale' Offers Vision AI Smart TV Buyers a Soundbar, Another TV

description: Samsung is said to have released a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature in China, which is essentially an upgraded version of the existing Live Captions. As per the tipster, the feature is called Voice Captioning, and it can transcribe live conversations, users’ voices via a microphone, and audio coming from the phone in real-time.
title: Samsung’s One UI 8 Said to Have Released an AI-Powered Voice Captioning Feature in China

description: Amazon’s Great Freedom Festival 2025 sale is live in India, offering major discounts on a wide range of products, including furniture, fashion, home appliances, and personal gadgets from top brands like Samsung, iQOO, and Lenovo. Prime members got early access, and additional savings are available through coupons, exchange offers, and bank discounts. SBI credit card users get 10 percent off, with up to Rs. 2,000 cashback on select cards. We've now highlighted the top-selling deals worth checking out before the sale ends.
title: Amazon Freedom Festival Sale 2025 Best-Selling Products Include Samsung Galaxy A55, iQOO Neo 10R and OnePlus Pad Go

description: Starfield will arrive on PS5 in Spring 2026, according to a new report. Bethesda's sci-fi RPG will reportedly get a PS5 version alongside its second expansion. The game's PS5 release was reportedly pushed back from 2025 party because of weak sales of the Shattered Space expansions.
title: Starfield to Reportedly Release on PS5 in Spring 2026, Alongside New Expansion

description: Truecaller will soon stop offering the call recording functionality on iPhone. The Swedish caller ID app re-introduced this ability on both Android and iOS platforms almost two years ago, following the prior discontinuation after Google cracked down on APIs designed for accessibility features related to voice calls. Instead, Truecaller will focus on improving its core spam-fighting functionality with features such as real-time caller identification and automatic blocking of spam telephone calls.
title: Truecaller to Discontinue Call Recording Feature on iPhones from September 30

description: Vivo Y04s has been launched by the Chinese smartphone manufacturer in Indonesia. The handset is powered by a 6,000mAh battery with 15W FlashCharge support. It runs on a Unisoc T612 SoC, coupled with 4GB of RAM and 64GB of onboard storage. The company has yet to reveal whether the phone will launch in other markets, including India.
title: Vivo Y04s Launched With 6.74-Inch Display, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp for Android might be developing a new feature that comes with several privacy benefits. Dubbed Username keys, there are two parts to this feature, a WhatsApp tracker revealed. The first part is the username itself, which is said to replace the need to share one’s number when sharing their WhatsApp account. The second is Username keys, which allow users to manage whether a first-time texter can contact the user or not.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Developing Username Keys to Help Users Avoid Unsolicited Messages

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 has entered its second week. The sale, which is being celebrated on the occasion of the Indian Independence Day, observed on August 15, started on July 31 at noon for all users. The e-commerce giant is offering platform-based discounts on a wide range of products, including smartphones, smartwatches, earphones, smart TVs, refrigerators, laptops, and more.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Semi-Automatic Washing Machines From LG, Samsung, Voltas, and More

description: Honor Play 70 Plus was recently launched by the company in China. The phone is available in four colour variants and houses a 7,000mAh battery with support for 45W fast charging. It sports a 6.77-inch display with peak brightness of 700 nits. Powering the device is the Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chipset, paired with 12GB RAM and up to 512GB storage.
title: Honor Play 70 Plus With 7,000mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 Chip Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Infinix GT 30 5G+ will be launched in India soon. Last week, Gadgets 360 exclusively reported about the handset’s impending arrival and the launch date has now been made official. It is expected to join the Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G which was introduced by the Transsion Holdings subsidiary last month. Alongside, key specifications of the Infinix GT 30 5G+ have also been teased.
title: Infinix GT 30 5G+ India Launch Confirmed for August 8; Key Specifications Revealed

description: Lenovo has launched another gaming laptop in its Legion series. The Legion R7000 (2025) is powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 H255 processor, coupled with the Nvidia RTX 5050 GPU. For memory and storage, it offers up to 16GB of RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage. The new gaming laptop also offers an offset touchpad with a backlit QWERTY keyboard.
title: Lenovo Legion R7000 (2025) Launched With Ryzen 7 H255 CPU, Nvidia RTX 5050 GPU: Price, Specifications
Vivo T4R 5G Brings Flagship Power, Premium Design: All for Under Rs. 20,000

description: WhatsApp banned over 98 lakh accounts in India in June to tackle abuse, with nearly 19.79 lakh removed proactively before any user complaints. The platform also received 23,596 user grievances and acted on 1,001 accounts, including bans and reinstatements. Most complaints were ban appeals, according to the company. Other concerns included account support, product issues, and safety. The Meta-owned platform stressed prevention and the use of abuse detection during account setup, messaging, and in response to negative user feedback.
title: WhatsApp Banned 98 Lakh Accounts in June in India Citing Harmful Activity

description: If you’re contemplating a new speaker purchase, then the Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 is a great avenue for availing hefty discounts and other offers on a wide range of products. The e-commerce giant has rolled out discounts of up to 50 percent on Bluetooth speakers from brands like Bose, JBL, Marshall, and Sony.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Bluetooth Speakers From Sony, JBL, boAt, and More

description: Apple is reportedly developing an in-house answer engine that will be powered by artificial intelligence (AI). As per the report, the company has also formed a new team that has been tasked with developing this ChatGPT-style answer engine product. Interestingly, the reported move comes after the Cupertino-based tech giant has downplayed the role of chatbots in its ecosystem and claimed that Apple will not be making any such product.
title: Apple Reportedly Developing a ChatGPT-Style Answer Engine

description: Nintendo has raised the prices of the Nintendo Switch family of consoles, along with certain Switch and Switch 2 accessories, in the US. The company cited "market conditions" for the price hike, but said the price of the Switch would remain the same for now.
title: Nintendo Hikes Price of Original Switch in the US, Switch 2 Price Remains Unchanged

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is expected to launch soon as a successor to last year's Galaxy S24 FE. Samsung is yet to confirm the launch date of the new Fan Edition (FE) smartphone, but ahead of that, the specifications of the Galaxy S25 FE have leaked online. It could run on Samsung's in-house Exynos 2400 chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE to Debut With Exynos 2400 SoC and 4,900mAh Battery: Report

description: Vivo Y400 5G runs Android 15-based Funtouch OS 15 and features a 6.67-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It is powered by a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset and includes a 50-megapixel dual rear camera unit, alongside a 32-megapixel front camera. The phone packs a 6,000mAh battery with 90W fast charging and supports an in-display fingerprint sensor. It is claimed to meet IP68+IP69 ratings for dust and water resistance.
title: Vivo Y400 5G Launched in India With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery

description: The ongoing Amazon Great Freedom Festival sale offers several compelling deals from leading brands like Acer, Asus, HP, and Lenovo. Here are our top picks for laptops priced under Rs. 60,000. The e-commerce platform is also offering up to 10 percent instant discount on SBI card transactions, along with customers exchange offers on eligible laptop models.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Discounts on Laptops From Acer, Asus, HP, and Lenovo Under Rs. 60,000

description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025, which began on August 31 at midnight for Prime members and at noon for others, is offering several devices, including home appliances, phones, smartwatches, TWS, and Bluetooth speakers, at discounted rates. As long as the sale event is live, interested buyers can get their hands on the electronics of their choice from famous brands across various price ranges.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 Brings Discounts on Bluetooth Speakers From Sony, Sonos, JBL, Bose and More

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 sale is live in India, offering major discounts across categories like fashion, gadgets, and home appliances, including smart TVs and washing machines. Additional savings can be availed through coupons, exchange offers, and bank discounts, including a 10 percent instant discount for SBI Credit Card users and up to Rs. 2,000 cashback on select bank cards. Top deals are available on 5-star rated top-loading washing machines from brands like Samsung, LG, and Whirlpool.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on 5-Star Rated Top-Loading Washing Machines

description: The launch of the iPhone 17 series is just a month away and the rumour mill is in overdrive, with leaks surfacing rapidly. The battery design of the iPhone 17 Pro has now been leaked and it provides a glimpse of what could power the phone under the hood. It appears to be encased in steel, something which we previously saw on the iPhone 16 Pro. This design element is speculated to result in better heat dissipation among other benefits.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Tipped to Feature L-Shaped Steel-Enclosed Battery With Different Designs for China, US Markets

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 has entered its fourth day in India. There are price cuts and other offers on devices across categories such as smartphones, laptops, tablets, wearables, TVs, ACs, and other home appliances. In this article, we have compiled a list of the top deals on gaming laptops from Asus, HP, and Lenovo under Rs. 1 lakh.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale: Top Deals on Gaming Laptops from Asus, HP, and Lenovo Under Rs. 1 Lakh
